description:
I keep trying to find beefy models to meet Zeke's build, but I think I found that he likes his dudes like he likes the ladies. Small and..well..hairless!
Justin's got the twink thing for sure, and I figured there would be some chemistry.
There's no intro on this. I got the flu twice this season, and in fact the both models were recovering themselves. We all sounded pretty pathetic. You will have to pick out the upcoming vids where I am in sinus hell.
Anyway, Zeke has kind of given up on the idea of topping, really enjoying being fucked. It seems odd to see the twink fuck the jock, but hey, maybe that's your high school fantasy come to life.
Enjoy!
title: Justin Bundy & Zeke - Wrapped
